name: actors_get_awards_summary
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool online_movie_database.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about films, actors, characters,etc... to create a movie/series/streaming content site/application
API description: Retrieves the awards summary for a specified actor or actress using the IMDb API.

nconst.description: You need to extract the value started with "nm" returned in …/actors/list-born-today or …/actors/list-most-popular-celebs endpoint. Ex : nm0001667
